job_description:
Job Summary:

We are seeking a motivated and detail-oriented individual to join our order entry team to support the efficient processing of manual orders for our client. The ideal candidates will be responsible for processing a high volume of orders daily while maintaining accuracy and quality and providing timely reporting on order progress.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Order Processing: Accurately enter and process assigned manual orders daily for the client, ensuring adherence to established timelines and quality standards.
  • Quality Assurance: Maintain high accuracy levels in order entry by double-checking all entries and addressing discrepancies promptly.
  • Reporting: Prepare and deliver timely updates and reports on order processing status to the management team/reporting.
  • Collaboration: Work closely with team members and other departments to streamline processes and resolve order-related issues.
  • Continuous Improvement: Identify opportunities for process improvements and participate in training sessions to enhance order entry skills and overall team performance.

Qualifications / Desired Candidate Profile:

  • Strong attention to detail and a commitment to accuracy.
  • Excellent organizational and time management skills, with the ability to handle high volumes of work under tight deadlines.
  • Proficient in data entry and comfortable using various software applications (experience with order management systems is a plus, especially Microsoft D365).
  • Effective communication skills, both written and verbal.
  • Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment.
  • Bachelor’s degree or a diploma / HSC with experience.
  • Experience 0- 6 years

Job Types: Full-time, Permanent, Fresher

Job Description:

We are seeking a versatile and dependable individual to fill the role of Site Supervisor cum Driver. In this position, you will be responsible for overseeing on-site operations while also performing driving duties as required.

Responsibilities:

1. Supervise day-to-day operations at construction sites, ensuring adherence to safety protocols, project timelines, and quality standards.

2. Coordinate with project managers, contractors, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth workflow and efficient completion of tasks.

3. Conduct regular inspections of work sites to identify potential hazards, quality issues, and compliance with regulations.

4. Manage inventory and equipment, including ordering supplies and coordinating maintenance.

5. Drive company vehicles to transport materials, equipment, and personnel to and from project sites.

6. Maintain cleanliness and organization of vehicles, ensuring they are in proper working condition.

7. Assist in loading and unloading materials and equipment at project sites.

8. Provide support to the project team as needed, including performing hands-on tasks during peak workload periods.

9. Keep accurate records of work activities, including mileage logs, vehicle maintenance, and on-site activities.

Requirements:

1. Valid driver's license with a clean driving record.

2. Proven experience in a similar role, preferably in the construction industry.

3. Strong organizational and multitasking skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks effectively.

4. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to interact with a diverse range of individuals.

5. Knowledge of safety regulations and best practices in construction.

6. Ability to work independently with minimal supervision and as part of a team.

7. Physically fit and able to lift heavy objects and perform manual labor as required.

8. Flexibility to work extended hours, weekends, and travel to various job sites as needed.

Benefits:

1. Competitive salary based on experience and qualifications.

2. Opportunities for career advancement and professional development.

3. Dynamic work environment with a supportive team.

Eligibility criteria:

1. Civil diploma/degree holder or Minimum 12th pass

2. Four wheeler and two wheeler driving licence holder

If you meet the requirements and are looking for an exciting opportunity to contribute to challenging projects, we encourage you to apply for the position of Site Supervisor cum Driver.

Please contact our HR Head

Mrs. Manisha Khetre

+91 9152000458

Thankyou

NoBrokerHood started in the year 2018, aimed to make life more convenient and secure for residents in

any housing society. NoBrokerHood offers a plethora of services and features which enables its

customer, as a user, to manage multiple activities inside residential buildings, housing societies, and

gated communities. From finding domestic help to monitoring visitor entry and maintenance or utility

bill payment, it’s all done from your phone. It also further strengthens the safety of your society by

keeping visual and digital records of all entries and exits – accessible anytime and anywhere – and

automates staff entry through a facial recognition or biometric process

To be successful in this role, you’ll need to have the following skills:

●

●

●

●

●

●

●

●

●

Communication: Excellent communication skills in English and/or the regional language.

Empathy: Understand the field sales as the demos need to be given at the societies.

Agility: Ability to change according to business requirements.

Motivation: Demonstrate a positive, ‘can-do’ attitude. Willing to roll up your sleeves and get things

done.

Growth-driven: Keen to grow as an individual.

Should be comfortable to work on weekends(Sat & Sun compulsory working), with a week off in

between Mon-Thursday.

Effective presentation and negotiation skills.

Hands on MS office excel, word & PPT etc

Should have a 2 wheeler vehicle with DL M

About the role:

●

●

●

●

●

●

Should have interest in Business development (B2C) for Software Application products/solutions.

Meet prospective clients, execute effective product demonstrations, emphasising product features and

benefits with focus on the value of the solution.

Meet with Committee Members of Apartments and societies to understand the scope of business and

their expectations.

Prospect, educate, qualify, and generate interest for Sales Opportunities.

On-boarding new apartments on the NoBrokerHood platform will be a major KRA for a BD.

Researching potential leads from the open market, web searches, or digital resources.

What we have to offer-

Working directly with leadership team; having high level of work independence, autonomy and

empowerment to lead company-wide changes

Being part of a start-up from an early stage, lead your area of expertise and be a part of this exciting

growth journey of changing the real estate world

Excellent platform for learning how to build teams, achieve goals and handle high growth

situations. Ideal for people with entrepreneurial ambitions.

Requirements

KEY QUALIFICATIONS

  • Graduation in any field
  • Minimum 1-5 years of proven sales track record and ability to meet targets.
  • Willingness to travel on field.

●

Mandatory

Benefits

Job Title: Machinist / Turner ( Exp & Fresher )

Location: Kopar khairane

Job Description: We are hiring 2 Machinists / Turners – 1 experienced and 1 fresher. Candidates must have completed ITI in Machinist or Turner trade with Apprenticeship (mandatory). Knowledge of conventional machines (lathe, milling, drilling) and the ability to read technical drawings are essential.

Key Responsibilities:

Operate lathe, milling, and drilling machines.

Read and interpret technical drawings.

Perform routine machine maintenance.

Ensure safety and cleanliness in the work area.

Qualifications:

Fresher: ITI (Machinist/Turner), Apprenticeship (mandatory).

Experienced: 1-2 years of experience, ability to read technical drawings.

Salary:

Fresher: ₹13,900/- per month (in-hand)

Experienced: ₹17,000 - ₹18,000/- per month (in-hand)

Shift timings:

First shift – 6:20 am to 2:20 pm

Second shift – 2:00 pm to 10:00 pm

Third shift – 10:00 pm to 6:00 am

General shift – 8:00 am to 4:30 pm

Pick-up and drop till Thane station.

As a Business Development Associate/Executive, you will be responsible for driving the company's

sales and revenue growth by identifying new business opportunities, building relationships with

potential clients, and working closely with the sales and marketing teams. Your primary focus will be

on expanding the company’s market presence and ensuring a steady pipeline of opportunities.

The opportunity is significant specifically for fresher or profiles with limited experience. There is a

big scope of learning to become an ace profile in the industry.

The JD can be wider in scope based on how much the candidate can bite n chew, but shall

broadly be as under:

 Identify and research potential clients and business opportunities in the target market.

 Build and maintain strong relationships with new and existing clients.

 Generate leads through networking, cold calling, and attending industry-related events.

 Prepare and deliver presentations or proposals to potential clients.

 Work closely with the sales and marketing teams to develop and implement business

strategies.

 Track and report progress on key performance metrics, including revenue targets and client

acquisition.

 Negotiate deals, contracts, and agreements to close new business.  Stay updated with industry trends, competitors, and market conditions to adjust strategies

as needed.

job_description:
We are seeking a motivated and enthusiastic Junior Media Communication professional to join our team. This role offers an opportunity to develop skills in media relations, content creation, social media management, and public relations. The ideal candidate will assist the communications team in delivering engaging content across various media channels, ensuring effective communication with target audiences.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Assist in creating, editing, and distributing press releases, blog posts, newsletters, and other communications materials.
  • Manage and update the company’s social media accounts (Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram, etc.) with engaging content.
  • Monitor media coverage and track the effectiveness of media campaigns.
  • Collaborate with the communications team to develop media strategies and messaging.
  • Support the organization of media events, press conferences, and public relations activities.
  • Help with the creation and design of marketing collateral such as brochures, flyers, and email campaigns.
  • Maintain a database of media contacts and relationships.
  • Assist in responding to media inquiries and drafting communication responses.
  • Ensure consistency in branding, tone, and messaging across all communication platforms.
  • Research industry trends, competitor communications, and media coverage to inform strategies.

About Beam Innovate

Beam Innovate is a leading eCommerce, CRM development and process automation company catering to a global client base. We specialize in building customized solutions that streamline customer relationship management and automate business processes, enabling companies to achieve efficiency and scale. We are seeking motivated, technically educated fresh graduates eager to gain hands-on experience in marketing and digital engagement.

Role Overview

As a Marketing Intern - Digital Engagement & Market Research, you will support the marketing team in identifying market opportunities, engaging potential clients, and contributing to our digital marketing initiatives. This role is perfect for fresh graduates with a technical background who are keen to explore marketing strategies in the B2B technology sector.

Key Responsibilities

  • Market Research & Analysis: Conduct research on industry trends, competitors, and potential clients to identify business opportunities in CRM and process automation.
  • Digital Engagement Strategies: Assist in planning and executing digital marketing strategies to enhance brand visibility and engagement.
  • Content Support: Collaborate with the marketing team to create engaging content such as blog posts, white papers, and case studies that highlight our solutions.
  • Database Management: Help maintain an organized database of potential clients and update CRM tools with accurate information.
  • Campaign Assistance: Support the implementation of email marketing, social media, and digital advertising campaigns to attract and engage prospects.
  • Performance Tracking: Analyze key performance metrics of marketing campaigns and suggest improvements based on data insights.
  • Collaboration: Work closely with sales and product teams to understand client needs and align marketing efforts accordingly.

Qualifications

  • Education: Recent graduate or final-year student in a technical field (e.g., Computer Science, IT, Engineering).
  • Interest in Marketing: Eager to learn about digital marketing, market research, and customer engagement.
  • Technical Skills: Basic understanding of CRM platforms, process automation, or web technologies is a plus.
  • Analytical Mindset: Ability to analyze data and identify trends for improving engagement strategies.
  • Communication Skills: Strong written and verbal communication skills for content creation and client interactions.
  • Familiarity with Tools: Experience with Google Workspace, LinkedIn, or CRM software (e.g., HubSpot, Salesforce) is a plus.

What We Offer

  • Hands-On Experience: Gain real-world experience in a tech-driven environment with a focus on CRM and process automation.
  • Mentorship: Learn from experienced professionals in marketing and technology.
  • Potential for Full-Time Employment: High-performing interns may be considered for a full-time role at the end of the internship.

Job Types: Full-time, Fresher, Internship, Contractual / Temporary
